text:
Hello everyone:wave-yeti::stable_parrot:We saw that a lot of you had questions about Layout Management, specifically `<Flex>` and `<Box>`. To help you in this process, we’ve released a new sample project called “<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/sample-projects#managing-layouts-flex-and-box|Managing Layouts: Flex and Box>”. This sample has two cards (see GIFs below) that show you how to :
• Use many components together in a Tile format
• Play around with the properties of `<Flex>`
• Implement good UX Practices with spacing
• Create two cards in one project
We hope this makes your custom card building experience even better and smoother! If you have any feedback we'd LOVE to hear it. Feel free to reply to this thread or we can set up a quick call:sprocket-dance:

:speaker: *Showcase your UI extensions at the upcoming Developer HUG event*

If you built a UI extension that you are proud of, here's an opportunity to showcase it at the upcoming Developer HUG event organized by <@UGDF9EBPW> <@UCT32UWDV> and <@UD53A9UUR>: *<https://events.HubSpot.com/events/details/HubSpot-developer-presents-the-pbampj-of-crm-customization-react-based-custom-cards/|The PB&J of CRM customization: React based Custom cards>*

*Fill out this <https://forms.gle/DAaGnZyzy4tmhmyv9|form>, with short description of your use case and a GIF demo,* and we will showcase your work with necessary credits to the developer & company that built it.

Fill out this form to share your extensions: <https://forms.gle/DAaGnZyzy4tmhmyv9|https://forms.gle/DAaGnZyzy4tmhmyv9>
